requestParams.name: fans_id
requestParams.desc: 粉丝id（mobile 或 fans_id 选其一，另者置为0，都有值以mobile为准）

requestParams.name: fans_type
requestParams.desc: 粉丝类型（自有粉丝: fans_type = 1）

requestParams.name: mobile
requestParams.desc: 手机号（mobile 或 fans_id 选其一，另者置为0，都有值以mobile为准）

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['level']=2
params['mobile']="15757872643"
params['fans_type']=0
params['fans_id']=0

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.salesman.account.update', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'2', 'mobile' => '15757872643', 'fans_type' => '0', 'fans_id' => '0', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
